query:
SELECT id, library_id, tmdb_id as "tmdb_id?", title, theme_color
            FROM series_references
            WHERE library_id = $1 AND title ILIKE $2
            ORDER BY 
                CASE 
                    WHEN LOWER(title) = LOWER($3) THEN 0
                    WHEN LOWER(title) LIKE LOWER($3 || '%') THEN 1
                    ELSE 2
                END,
                LENGTH(title)
            LIMIT 1
